channel.title: Postgres on Bartlomiej Mika
channel.description: Recent content in Postgres on Bartlomiej Mika

item.title: How to Import Datetime Columns from a PgAdmin5 CSV export file in Golang
item.description: If you’ve exported from PgAdmin a CSV file and tried to import that CSV into your Golang app, you may have noticed there is a challenge with importing the datatime. The purpose of this article contains the code I wrote to help me with this problem.

item.title: How to Build an API Server in Go - Part 3: Postgres Database
item.description: The purpose of this article is to provide instructions on how to setup postgres database with our application.
